messages.title: IT'S TIME FOR CHANGE
messages.content: The general election is just weeks away now. This is a big moment for Britain. It comes at a time when our economy is in deep trouble, we need to mend our broken society and rebuild trust in our political system. We can't go on like this. Britain needs change and our country needs back on its feet - to heal the mistakes of the past and bring new ideas and energy for our future.

messages.title: WE CAN'T GO ON LIKE THIS
messages.content: The general election is just weeks away now. This is a big moment for Britain. It comes at a time when our economy is in deep trouble, we need to mend our broken society and rebuild trust in our political system. We can't go on like this. Britain needs change and our country needs back on its feet - to heal the mistakes of the past and bring new ideas and energy for our future.

issues.governance: The leaflet talks about the need to restore responsibility to our society, leave a debt problem, the worse it gets, restore responsibility to our society, mend our broken society and rebuild trust in our political system.
issues.health: Plans to protect spending on the NHS and improve it for everyone.

contactInformation.address: Campaign Headquarters, 13 Market Place, Romsey, Hampshire, SO51 8NA

quotes.text: When you're standing in that polling booth with the pencil in your hand, I want you to remember this: your vote will help decide the kind of country Britain can be for the decades ahead. Vote for a positive future. Vote Conservative. Voting for anyone else will only help Gordon Brown cling to power. So please - for the sake of our great country - don't give up the chance for change.

images.caption: Caroline Nokes is taking up local issues big and small.
Working with David Cameron to bring about change.
Caroline calls on local residents all year round.
